page.title: 18Car and People Count
page.content: On July 1st Crispin,Andrew and I went into the school courtyard which is at the front of our school,to count cars and other motor vehicles that passed Church Road.We counted for an hour.In that time 510 vehicles passed by.We then multiplied this number by 24,and found that in one day 6,120 motor vehicles on average would pass by our school.The next day we went to Rectory Road to see how many people I saw walk down the road.Owen was counting cars.I saw 102 people walk down Rectory Road. Owen saw 82 cars go by.Down Rectory Road there is the library,the Rectory, our school back entrance and some houses.Rectory Road is a lot more peaceful than Church Road.
